name: Mass Behaviour
description:
Game Controls Left joystick
Right joystickMove your cell (point)
Move SyringeRBPut down a flagAlt + F4Quit The Game

Mass Behaviour is an experimental game where the player controls a point inside a huge crowd of similar points. The goal is to spot the controlled point and move into the green circle. 

Credits

Vincent Trinel Game Designer

Website
